Html:
I have used Rawr a fair bit about 3 months ago and thought I knew what I was doing.

I have recently changed from elemental to enchance with my shammy and I am trying to use RAWR to optimise my gemming / enchants for this spec. I used charater profiler to transfer my equiped and banked items into rawr. I have deliberately not enchanted any items prior to importing them as I wanted to see what RAWR suggested. I noticed that the diamond box next to each item had a red dot next to it which I assume means it is limiting the options for enchants. I went through each item and under the right click option I selected ANY enchant for all the items I have in my bank / equiped. I dont recall having to do this when I have used this program in the past, and it was quite annoying.

I then ran an optimisation of my current gear, and for some reason it didn't suggest any enchants. I have run multiple optimisations, with override regem / override reenchant box checked and unchecked. Each time it doesn't alter any of the enchant options. I have gone through and manually selected enchants that I thought would be useful and rerun the optimisation. However it returns suggestions with most of the items unenchanted.

Am I missing something here?

As I have said I haven't had these troubles previously with this fantastic program
What you're missing is that 'ANY' means any enchant that you have available. You need to mark enchants as available as well, on the Enchant charts.
